com.snowplowanalytics.snowplow.tracker.utils

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snowplowanalytics.snowplow.tracker.utils.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides basic Utilities for the Snowplow Tracker.

      • isTimeInRange

        public static boolean isTimeInRange(long startTime,
                                    long checkTime,
                                    long range)
        The startTime must be greater than the endTime minus the interval to be within an acceptable range. Example: - Start Time = 1425060000000 // Fri, 27 Feb 2015 18:00:00 GMT - Check Time = 1425060300000 // Fri, 27 Feb 2015 18:05:00 GMT - Range = 600000 // 10 minutes If the start time is greater than 17:55:00 then it is in range.
        Parameters:
        startTime - the startTime of the check
        checkTime - the time of the check
        range - the allowed range the startTime must be in
        Returns:
        whether the time is in range or not

        public static void addToMap(java.lang.String key,
                            java.lang.Object value,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map)
        Inserts a value into a map safely. NOTE: Avoid putting null or empty values in the map. If they are strings, avoid empty strings
        Parameters:
        key - a key value
        value - the value associated with the key
        map - the map to insert the pair into
